author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This PR adds workflows to test ECal Phase-2 Trigger Primitive, with also ECAL component.

This PR need https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42633 and https://github.com/cms-data/SimCalorimetry-EcalEBTrigPrimProducers/pull/1 to test

#### PR validation:
Run workflow 24834.633,24834.634,24834.635

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
No need to backport
title: Add Phase-2 workflow with Phase-2 ECal trigger primitive, also with ECal component
